channel.title: Exporting movies in Adobe Flash CS5.5
channel.description: I have Flash CS5.5 and I tried to export my movie. It ended up exporting in the AVI file format, except it was 1.1GB. I tried reducing my settings and even removed the sound, it still came up 1.1GB. I tried to export it using different options, but its really not working, the file size is just getting bigger. How can I export it properly and have my 3 minute video be like 50MB instead of 1000MB+? Thanks.

item.title: Exporting movies in Adobe Flash CS5.5
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:3, topic:437843”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=540562.msg3958951#msg3958951 date=1333067726]

I have Flash CS5.5 and I tried to export my movie. It ended up exporting in the AVI file format, except it was 1.1GB. I tried reducing my settings and even removed the sound, it still came up 1.1GB. I tried to export it using different options, but its really not working, the file size is just getting bigger. How can I export it properly and have my 3 minute video be like 50MB instead of 1000MB+?
Thanks.

try a different file format. Avi files does come out rendered large
render in .wmv (windows media video) it usually comes out in the 50mbs like you want
[/quote]

I changed the quality from great to shit and now its 100MB. So it all worked out. A mod can close this.[/quote]
compressing from avi to wmv can save you even more room.
you can keep the same great quality at 100mb (I believe) try it

Read full topic
item.source: Exporting movies in Adobe Flash CS5.5

item.title: Exporting movies in Adobe Flash CS5.5
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:2, topic:437843”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=540562.msg3958896#msg3958896 date=1333063608]
I have Flash CS5.5 and I tried to export my movie. It ended up exporting in the AVI file format, except it was 1.1GB. I tried reducing my settings and even removed the sound, it still came up 1.1GB. I tried to export it using different options, but its really not working, the file size is just getting bigger. How can I export it properly and have my 3 minute video be like 50MB instead of 1000MB+?
Thanks.
[/quote]
try a different file format. Avi files does come out rendered large
render in .wmv (windows media video) it usually comes out in the 50mbs like you want[/quote]

I changed the quality from great to shit and now its 100MB. So it all worked out. A mod can close this.

Read full topic
